comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Damn. Of all the rides to miss. 4-Mile on a Fall day. I have to run errands at lunch... Zack and I are leaving for North Park right after work and I need to get the final prep taken care of over the noon hour. At least it's for a good cause. Have a great ride, Frenz. You too, Matt.

comments.author: Greg
comments.body: I'm sorry I missed today's ride too. Afraid I had a meeting go a little long and run past the noon hour. Say, are those pictured woolly sheep the ones that were dancing through Steve's sick-addled mind yesterday? You must have been in really bad shape buddy. and I enjoyed a beautiful ride up Flagstaff with perfect weather conditions.
